head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAGGIOLO, WALTER A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAGGIOLO, WALTER A.

block.p: MAGGIOLO-Walter A. On Monday, August 7, 2000, of Arlington, VA. Surviving are cousins and a host of friends. Mr. Maggiolo was a Mediator, Arbitrator and Educator, having retired from the Federal Mediation Consiliation Service. Friends may call at The Murphy Funeral Home of Arlington, 4510 Wilson Blvd., on Thursday, from 2 to 4:00PM and 7 to 9:00PM. Mass of Christian Burial will be offered at 10:00AM, Friday, in St. Ann's Catholic Church, 5300 North 10th Street, Arlington, VA. Interment National Memorial Park.
